articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: South Africa’s ANC suspends former President Jacob Zuma - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The suspension of the former South African President comes ahead of the country’s general elections.
articles.content:
South Africas ruling African National Congress (ANC) has suspended former President Jacob Zuma, weeks after he backed another party ahead of this years general election.
